content: As an AI language model, I don't have personal opinions, but according to industry experts, electric cars are expected to become more popular in the future due to advancements in battery technology, increased production, and government incentives for electric vehicles. Additionally, climate change and the need to reduce emissions are driving more consumers to choose electric cars. In many countries, there are initiatives to phase out gasoline cars completely in the next few decades, which will likely lead to further growth of electric cars. So, it is safe to assume that the future of the automotive industry lies with electric vehicles.
